content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE VIEW [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHYWTEXT_DYNAMIC]
AS SELECT h.[profitcenterhierarchy]
,h.[controllingarea]
,h.[child]
,h.[parent]
,nullif((select CC.[key] FROM [dmgold].[I_PROFITCENTER] CC
  where
  h.CONTROLLINGAREA = CC.CONTROLLINGAREA
  and h.ProfitCENTER = CC.ProfitCENTER
  and h.VALIDITYENDDATE	= CC.validityenddate
),null) as [Profit_Center_Node_Key]
, sp.[_ISOLanguage] as [_ISOLanguage] 
--'EN' as [_ISOLanguage]
,h.[level1]
,h.[level1_key]
,nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ',h.[level1],(select ht.hierarchynodetext FROM [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHYNODEFINAL] ht 
 where ht.[key] = h.[level1_key]
and ht.[profitcenterhierarchy] = h.[profitcenterhierarchy]
and ht.[controllingarea] = h.[controllingarea]
and ht.[validityenddate] = '99991231'
and [_ISOLanguage] = sp.[_ISOLanguage]),null),null) as Profit_Center_Hier_Level1_Text

,h.[level2]
,h.[level2_key]
,nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ',h.[level2],(select ht.hierarchynodetext FROM [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHYNODEFINAL] ht 
where
ht.[key] = h.[level2_key] 
and ht.[profitcenterhierarchy] = h.[profitcenterhierarchy]
and ht.[controllingarea] = h.[controllingarea]
and ht.[validityenddate] = '99991231'
and [_ISOLanguage] = sp.[_ISOLanguage]),null),null) as Profit_Center_Hier_Level2_Text

,h.[level3]
,h.[level3_key]
,nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ',h.[level3],(select ht.hierarchynodetext FROM [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHYNODEFINAL] ht 
where
ht.[key] = h.[level3_key]
and ht.[profitcenterhierarchy] = h.[profitcenterhierarchy]
and ht.[controllingarea] = h.[controllingarea]
and ht.[validityenddate] = '99991231'
and [_ISOLanguage] = sp.[_ISOLanguage]),null),null) as Profit_Center_Hier_Level3_Text


,h.[level4]
,h.[level4_key]
,nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ',h.[level4],(select ht.hierarchynodetext FROM [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHYNODEFINAL] ht 
where
ht.[key] = h.[level4_key]
and ht.[profitcenterhierarchy] = h.[profitcenterhierarchy]
and ht.[controllingarea] = h.[controllingarea]
and ht.[validityenddate] = '99991231'
and [_ISOLanguage] = sp.[_ISOLanguage]),null),null) as Profit_Center_Hier_Level4_Text

,h.[level5]
,h.[level5_key]
,nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ',h.[level5],(select ht.hierarchynodetext FROM [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHYNODEFINAL] ht 
where
ht.[key] = h.[level5_key] 
and ht.[profitcenterhierarchy] = h.[profitcenterhierarchy]
and ht.[controllingarea] = h.[controllingarea]
and ht.[validityenddate] = '99991231'
and [_ISOLanguage] = sp.[_ISOLanguage]),null),null) as Profit_Center_Hier_Level5_Text

,h.[level6]
,h.[level6_key]
,nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ',h.[level6],(select ht.hierarchynodetext FROM [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHYNODEFINAL] ht 
where
ht.[key] = h.[level6_key]
and ht.[profitcenterhierarchy] = h.[profitcenterhierarchy]
and ht.[controllingarea] = h.[controllingarea]
and ht.[validityenddate] = '99991231'
and [_ISOLanguage] = sp.[_ISOLanguage]),null),null) as Profit_Center_Hier_Level6_Text
	
,h.[level7]
,h.[level7_key]
,nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ',h.[level7],(select ht.hierarchynodetext FROM [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHYNODEFINAL] ht 
where
ht.[key] = h.[level7_key] 
and ht.[profitcenterhierarchy] = h.[profitcenterhierarchy]
and ht.[controllingarea] = h.[controllingarea]
and ht.[validityenddate] = '99991231'
and [_ISOLanguage] = sp.[_ISOLanguage]),null),null) as Profit_Center_Hier_Level7_Text
	
,h.[level8]
,h.[level8_key]
,nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ',h.[level8],(select ht.hierarchynodetext FROM [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHYNODEFINAL] ht 
where
ht.[key] = h.[level8_key]
and ht.[profitcenterhierarchy] = h.[profitcenterhierarchy]
and ht.[controllingarea] = h.[controllingarea]
and ht.[validityenddate] = '99991231'
and [_ISOLanguage] = sp.[_ISOLanguage]),null),null) as Profit_Center_Hier_Level8_Text
	
,h.[level9]
,h.[level9_key]
,nullif(CONCAT_WS(' ',h.[level9],(select ht.hierarchynodetext FROM [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHYNODEFINAL] ht 
 where
 ht.[key] = h.[level9_key]
and ht.[profitcenterhierarchy] = h.[profitcenterhierarchy]
and ht.[controllingarea] = h.[controllingarea]
and ht.[validityenddate] = '99991231'
 and [_ISOLanguage] = sp.[_ISOLanguage]),null),null) as Profit_Center_Hier_Level9_Text
		    
,h.[hierarchypath]
,h.[MaxHierarchyLevel]
,h.[_SystemName]
,h.VALIDITYENDDATE,h.VALIDITYSTARTDATE
 FROM [dmgold].[PROFITCENTERHIERARCHY] h,[dmgold].[SAPLANGUAGE_Test] sp
 where h.[_SystemName]=sp.[_SystemName];
GO
